card_pools.description: A collection of card pools that define which cards can appear in specific situations or rewards.

id.description: Unique identifier for this card pool. Used to reference this pool from other parts of the game.

items.description: Reference to a card's unique identifier that can appear in this pool.

cards.description: List of card references that can appear in this pool.

items.description: A card pool definition that specifies which cards can appear together.
